name: Channel Divinity
trigger: when you choose to use Channel Divinity
effects: you can use Channel Divinity effects such as Divine Sense
when a Channel Divinity effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals your paladin spell save DC
limits: you can use Channel Divinity twice and regain one use on a short rest and all uses on a long rest
you gain an additional use at paladin level 11
